scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run build-bundle-es5 && npm run test-local
scripts.test-ci: npm run lint && npm run build-bundle-es5 && npm run test-remote
scripts.build: npm run build-es5 && npm run build-bundle && npm run build-minify
scripts.build-es5: npm run build-bundle-es5 && npm run build-minify-es5
scripts.build-bundle: ./node_modules/.bin/browserify src/module.js -t [ envify --TANGRAM_BUILD_ENV es6 ] -t [ babelify --plugins [ @babel/plugin-transform-modules-commonjs ] ] -t brfs --debug -s Tangram -p browserify-derequire -p [ mapstraction ./dist/tangram.debug.js.map ] -o ./dist/tangram.debug.js
scripts.build-bundle-es5: ./node_modules/.bin/browserify src/module.js -t [ envify --TANGRAM_BUILD_ENV es5 ] -t [ babelify --presets [ @babel/env ] ] -t brfs --debug -s Tangram -p browserify-derequire -p [ mapstraction ./dist/tangram.es5.debug.js.map ] -o ./dist/tangram.es5.debug.js
scripts.build-minify: ./node_modules/.bin/terser dist/tangram.debug.js -c warnings=false -m | sed -e 's/tangram.debug.js.map//g' > dist/tangram.min.js && npm run build-size
scripts.build-size: gzip dist/tangram.min.js -c | wc -c | awk '{kb=$1/1024; print kb}' OFMT='%.0fk minified+gzipped'
scripts.watch: ./node_modules/.bin/budo src/module.js:dist/tangram.debug.js --port 8000 --cors --live -- -t [ envify --TANGRAM_BUILD_ENV es6 ] -t [ babelify --plugins [ @babel/plugin-transform-modules-commonjs ] ] -t brfs -s Tangram -p [ mapstraction ./dist/tangram.debug.temp.js.map ]
